patthana1.13:270.1_0: Paritto dhammo parittassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.13:271.1_0: Paritto dhammo mahaggatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.13:272.1_0: Paritto dhammo appamāṇassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.13:273.1_0: Mahaggato dhammo mahaggatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.13:274.1_0: Mahaggato dhammo parittassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.13:275.1_0: Mahaggato dhammo appamāṇassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.13:276.1_0: Mahaggato dhammo parittassa ca mahaggatassa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.13:277.1_0: Appamāṇo dhammo appamāṇassa dhammassa (…) sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.13:278.1_0: Appamāṇo dhammo parittassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.13:279.1_0: Appamāṇo dhammo mahaggatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.13:280.1_0: Appamāṇo dhammo parittassa ca appamāṇassa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.13:281.1_0: Paritto ca appamāṇo ca dhammā parittassa dhammassa sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana1.13:282.1_0: Paritto ca appamāṇo ca dhammā appamāṇassa dhammassa sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana1.13:283.1_0: Paritto ca mahaggato ca dhammā parittassa dhammassa sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana1.13:284.1_0: Paritto ca mahaggato ca dhammā mahaggatassa dhammassa sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
